talk.utter: the ncaa governs high school student athletics in the us. the policy is currently in the air because they are following what the ioc is doing, sport by sport guidelines to attempt to insure fairness while providing guidelines that are inclusive.

talk.author: did:plc:prcqcolm6xcev25ja3jp25rl
talk.utter: This is false. It's in the air because they are catering to bigots, not to ensure fairness.

talk.author: did:plc:jrqsc7ron2oydhokchs4v4ad
talk.utter: they are explicitly following the IOC’s lead, and i haven’t seen evidence that the ioc is working to cater to bigots. their framework on fairness is pretty clear and so long as it is applied honestly when making rules it will be about as close to fair as one could hope

talk.author: did:plc:jrqsc7ron2oydhokchs4v4ad
